channel.title: Lives on Xiang Li's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lives on Xiang Li's Blog

item.title: Book Review: 'Out of Gobi' & 'Money Games' & 'Money Machine'
item.description: All three books are written by the Chinese economist and investor, Weijian Shan.

item.title: Book Review: 'The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People'
item.description: Hardly had I ever encountered any book that makes me feel both peaceful and insightful, this book is one of them.

item.title: Book Review: 'The little book of common sense investing'
item.description: It’s a book given by a friend a few years ago when I started dipping my toes into the stock market.

item.title: What I have learnt from PhD career
item.description: It has been a few months since I officially graduated from the PhD program in August this year, I didn’t write the article immediately after school as I wanted to have a more comprehensive review of the past four-year experience from a distance in terms of time.

item.title: Book Review: 'Twice a Quincea√±era'
item.description: I appreciate the self-love theme that the writer tried to convey, but I don’t enjoy reading the book, just read for the sake of finishing and a reading club discussion.

item.title: Book Review: 'Nonviolent Communication'
item.description: Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing, there is a field.

item.title: Book Review: 'The Surrender Experiment'
item.description: Have you ever thought about is the being you are right now a result of cumulative subjective decisions you have made in the past, or completely determined by the universe?

item.title: Book Review: 'The Courage To be Disliked'
item.description: People always say “listen to your heart”, but often the voice of heart is blurred by the outside noise and cannot be heard clearly.

item.title: Book Review: 'The Price We Pay'
item.description: When I embarked on my journey in the U.S. a few years ago, one of the tips that was repeatedly given was to try not to call the ambulance service in the U.

item.title: Dan Dan's relocation story
item.description: Merry Christmas from Dan Dan to everyone!

item.title: What I have learnt from being a Data Scientist Intern
item.description: Time flies. My ten-weeks summer internship just ended last week, and now may be a good time for me to reflect on the journey and summarize what I have learned from this valuable experience.
